Database Class

Placeholder…

class Database
Database::__getInstance(string $name = null)

Get database class instance

Returns the database instance for a given name name. If the database handler has not been initiated yet it will be before the instance is returned.

If the $name is not provided the instance with the name Database::MAIN_INSTANCE_NAME

Parameters

  • $name (string) – Name of the database instance

Returns

object Database class instance

Database::__construct(?string $name = null, string $dsn = '', string|null $usr = null, string|null $pwd = null)
Throws

  • Exception – if instance is not found

  • PDOException – if instance is not found
